layout_type.Description: The layout type of the dashboard, either 'free' or 'ordered'.

notify_list.Description: The list of handles of users to notify when changes are made to this dashboard.

template_variable.Description: The list of template variables for this dashboard.

default.Description: The default value for the template variable on dashboard load.

prefix.Description: The tag prefix associated with the variable. Only tags with this prefix will appear in the variable dropdown.

widget.Description: The list of widgets to display on the dashboard.

alert_graph_definition.Description: The definition for a Alert Graph widget

alert_value_definition.Description: The definition for a Alert Value widget

change_definition.Description: The definition for a Change  widget

check_status_definition.Description: The definition for a Check Status widget

distribution_definition.Description: The definition for a Distribution widget

event_stream_definition.Description: The definition for a Event Stream widget

event_timeline_definition.Description: The definition for a Event Timeline widget

free_text_definition.Description: The definition for a Free Text widget

group_definition.Description: The definition for a Group widget

layout_type.Description: The layout type of the group, only 'ordered' for now.

widget.Description: The list of widgets in this group.

alert_value_definition.Description: The definition for a Alert Value widget

heatmap_definition.Description: The definition for a Heatmap widget

hostmap_definition.Description: The definition for a Hostmap widget

iframe_definition.Description: The definition for an Iframe widget

image_definition.Description: The definition for an Image widget

layout.Description: The layout of the widget on a 'free' dashboard

log_stream_definition.Description: The definition for an Log Stream widget

manage_status_definition.Description: The definition for an Manage Status widget

note_definition.Description: The definition for a Note widget

query_value_definition.Description: The definition for a Query Value widget

image_definition.Description: The definition for an Image widget

layout.Description: The layout of the widget on a 'free' dashboard

log_stream_definition.Description: The definition for an Log Stream widget

manage_status_definition.Description: The definition for an Manage Status widget

note_definition.Description: The definition for a Note widget

query_value_definition.Description: The definition for a Query Value widget

scatterplot_definition.Description: The definition for a Scatterplot widget

service_level_objective_definition.Description: The definition for a Service Level Objective widget

timeseries_definition.Description: The definition for a Timeseries widget

toplist_definition.Description: The definition for a Toplist widget

trace_service_definition.Description: The definition for a Trace Service widget

dash_item.Description: A set of dashbaord items that belong to this list

dash_id.Description: The ID of the dashboard to add

name.Description: The name of the Dashboard List

active.Description: When true indicates this downtime is being actively applied

disabled.Description: When true indicates this downtime is not being applied

end.Description: Optionally specify an end date when this downtime should expire

message.Description: An optional message to provide when creating the downtime, can include notification handles

monitor_id.Description: When specified, this downtime will only apply to this monitor

monitor_tags.Description: A list of monitor tags (up to 25), i.e. tags that are applied directly to monitors to which the downtime applies

recurrence.Description: Optional recurring schedule for this downtime

scope.Description: specify the group scope to which this downtime applies. For everything use '*'

start.Description: Specify when this downtime should start

timezone.Description: The timezone for the downtime, default UTC

services.Description: A list of service names and service keys.

shared.Description: Whether the screenboard is shared or not

template_variable.Description: A list of template variables for using Dashboard templating.

default.Description: The default value for the template variable on dashboard load.

prefix.Description: The tag prefix associated with the variable. Only tags with this prefix will appear in the variable dropdown.

text.Description: For widgets of type 'free_text', the text to use.

conditional_format.Description: A list of conditional formatting rules.

palette.Description: The palette to use if this condition is met.

value.Description: Value that is threshold for conditional format

title_align.Description: The alignment of the widget's title.

title_size.Description: The size of the widget's title.

type.Description: The type of the widget. One of [ 'free_text', 'timeseries', 'query_value', 'toplist', 'change', 'event_timeline', 'event_stream', 'image', 'note', 'alert_graph', 'alert_value', 'iframe', 'check_status', 'trace_service', 'hostmap', 'manage_status', 'log_stream', 'uptime', 'process']

x.Description: The position of the widget on the x axis.

y.Description: The position of the widget on the y axis.

groups.Description: A static set of groups to filter monitor-based SLOs

monitor_ids.Description: A static set of monitor IDs to use as part of the SLO

monitor_search.Description: A dynamic search on creation for the SLO

query.Description: The metric query of good / total events

description.Description: A description of the dashboard's content.

events.Description: Filter for events to be overlayed on the graph.

group.Description: A list of groupings for hostmap type graphs.

include_no_metric_hosts.Description: Include hosts without metrics in hostmap graphs

include_ungrouped_hosts.Description: Include ungrouped hosts in hostmap graphs

node_type.Description: Type of nodes to show in hostmap graphs (either 'host' or 'container').

change_type.Description: Type of change for change graphs.

compare_to.Description: The time period to compare change against in change graphs.

conditional_format.Description: A list of conditional formatting rules.

palette.Description: The palette to use if this condition is met.

value.Description: Value that is threshold for conditional format

extra_col.Description: If set to 'present', this will include the present values in change graphs.

increase_good.Description: Decides whether to represent increases as good or bad in change graphs.

order_by.Description: The field a change graph will be ordered by.

order_direction.Description: Sort change graph in ascending or descending order.

scope.Description: A list of scope filters for hostmap type graphs.

template_variable.Description: A list of template variables for using Dashboard templating.

default.Description: The default value for the template variable on dashboard load.

prefix.Description: The tag prefix associated with the variable. Only tags with this prefix will appear in the variable dropdown.

is_admin.Deprecated: This parameter will be replaced by `access_role` and will be removed from the next Major version

role.Deprecated: This parameter was removed from the API and has no effect
